EN_transcript: But as it is in human nature to attempt the solu tion of every mystery, Passepartout suddenly discovered an explanation of Fix's movements, which was in truth far from unreasonable, Fix, he thought, could only be an agent of Mr. Fogg's friends at the Reform Club, sent to follow him up,' and to ascertain that he really went round the world as had been agreed upon.

DE_transcript: Ganz offenbar! wiederholte sich der brave Junge, der auf seinen Scharfsinn ganz stolz war.

EN_transcript: Passepartout, enchanted with his discovery, resolved to say nothing to his master, lest he should be justly offended at this mistrust on the part of his adversaries.
